name: General.BookingTimes
description: Previsouly called Schedule. This object refers to times used for the Booking Option Request (preferences part of the request) or the Booking Option (times sur as LAT where there is a commitment from the carrier)

columns.name: earliestAcceptanceTime
columns.description: Earliest acceptance date time (requested or proposed)

columns.name: latestAcceptanceTime
columns.description: Latest Acceptance time as per CargoIQ definition (requested; proposed or actual)

columns.name: timeOfAvailability
columns.description: Time of availability of the shipment as per CargoIQ definition

columns.name: totalTransitTime
columns.description: Total transit time as per CargoIQ definition; expressed as a duration
